thread.section_title: The Flights Guru Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Flights Guru | theflightsguru.co.uk | 2 of 7
thread.title: Roisin Scott
thread.title_full: The Flights Guru reviewed by Roisin Scott

author: Roisin Scott
title: Roisin Scott
text:
Our hole experience with Flights Guru , especially Eric has been fantastic. Eric has been on hand at any time to assist with any queries we had with tickets , information we were looking at about our holiday.
So over all highly pleased with everything...now its just to get excited about our Bali trip.
